translations: v．悄悄接近，侧身而行：以侧身的方式悄悄地或不引人注意地移动。
· He sidled up to me and whispered in my ear.
他悄悄地靠近我，在我耳边低声说话。

sentences.sentence: She sidled up to me and whispered something in my ear.
sentences.translation: 她悄悄走上前来，对我耳语了几句。

sentences.sentence: A young man sidled up to me and said, "May I help you?"
sentences.translation: 一个年轻人悄悄地走向我，并说道：“我可以帮你吗？”

sentences.sentence: He so sidled and twittered and tilted as he hopped on his bush.
sentences.translation: 他一边跳上灌木，一边侧身、叽叽喳喳、倾斜身子。
